text: Sonic Rivals is a racing video game for the PlayStation Portable that came out on November 16, 2006. The game is made by Backbone Entertainment and Sega. Players can play as Sonic the Hedgehog, Shadow the Hedgehog, Knuckles the Echidna, Metal Sonic or Silver the Hedgehog. title: Sonic Rivals
